QAPair.Question: What is (are) Elbow replacement ?
QAPair.Answer: Elbow replacement is surgery to replace the elbow joint with artificial joint parts ( prosthetics ).

QAPair.Question: What is (are) Elbow replacement ?
QAPair.Answer: Elbow replacement is surgery to replace the elbow joint with artificial joint parts ( prosthetics ).

QAPair.Question: Who is at risk for Elbow replacement? ?
What is the outlook for Elbow replacement ?
QAPair.Answer: Elbow replacement surgery eases pain for most people. It can also increase the range of motion of your elbow joint. A second elbow replacement surgery is usually not as successful as the first one.
